attributes.action: Petition Falkirk Council to change the uplift of green bins back to fortnightly
attributes.additional_details: This will lead to rat infestation and other problems.
attributes.background: Falkirk Council are only emptying green bins once a month. This is totally unacceptable for most households. We have had instances where they have refused to empty bins due to lids not being closed properly.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is the responsibility of Falkirk Council, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could make a complaint to Falkirk Council about this issue using the link below:

http://www.falkirk.gov.uk/contact-us/complaints/
